text: Does anyone have a good “setting julia 1.6 up with ssh keys on Windows 10 for dummies” guide, so that private registries and repos work? Right down to the details of how to install ssh keys on windows

elements.text: Does anyone have a good “setting julia 1.6 up with ssh keys on Windows 10 for dummies” guide, so that private registries and repos work? Right down to the details of how to install ssh keys on windows

text: I don’t know of a guide, but I used windows 10 + git with a private registry last summer, and found this comment essential: <https://github.com/JuliaLang/Pkg.jl/issues/911#issuecomment-515631128>. My experience is that if you don’t generate a key with PEM, then nothing works and you get very confusing error messages. Then I also needed to set `Pkg.setprotocol!(protocol="ssh")` in my `startup.jl`.
